data.title: BPM - xCelerated Technologies
data.meta_description: Oracle WebLogic, WebCenter, BPM, WebCenter Suite, Oracle Portal
data.text:
Oracle WebLogic, WebCenter, BPM

xCelerated offers solutions focusing on process and usability improvement solutions like Business Process Management (BPM), Portals, and Content Management - all enabled in a Service Oriented Architecture (SOA).

From analysis through implementation, we have a successful track record of delivery of enterprise portal and CMS projects for clients in a variety of industries. To ensure usability and adoption, our methodology focuses on user-centricity, starting with requirements analysis and Web design and continuing throughout the delivery process. xCelreated has partnered with and established effective working relationships with many customers in developing user-centric, collaborative, transaction-based solutions. We have significant experience delivering solutions utilizing portal products for many companies, working on everything from Intranet solutions to partner and supply Extranet portals as well as company dot-com sites and corporate dashboards.

As early as 2002 we were performing portal implementations using Plumtree's portal application as well as BEA WebLogic Portal. As these portal vendors have been acquired by Oracle over the years — Plumtree by BEA Systems, before BEA Systems itself was acquired by Oracle — we have continued to hone our skills by implementing solutions using the various iterations of each product, including Oracle's WebCenter Suite portal platform. Our longstanding commitment to these best-of-breed portal applications and platforms means that xCelerated is uniquely positioned to support any Oracle-centric portal implementations. Although Oracle represents our main technology area of focus for portals, we also have significant experience with open source portal frameworks and the following enterprise portal platforms: IBM WebSphere, Microsoft SharePoint, and Sun Java Enterprise System (JES) Portal.

WebCenter Suite

Following are a few of the areas that xCelerated serves for the Oracle WebCenter product:

WebCenter Design and Architecture

Portlet Development (JSR168, 170, and JPDK)

Portal Strategy and Site Structure

Portal Solution Implementation

LDAP Integration

Installation, Configuration, and Maintenance

Custom Application Integration

Composer, Spaces, Wikis, Blogs, Forums, Tags, and the many unique WebCenter services

Both Oracle Application Server as well as WebLogic

Having years of SOA, Oracle Portal, Web/Enterprise 2.0, and Java/J2EE experience, xCelerated has been uniquely positioned to rapidly deliver solutions using Oracle's WebCenter Suite. xCelerated has developers in the US and offshore with experience building applications with Oracle WebCenter Suite.

BPM Services

Our team has a broad range of skills and experience providing BPM solutions for all sizes of organizations throughout the world. We offer consulting services that can help your organization deliver value added, process-oriented solutions and allow you to become more competitive in the marketplace.

xCelerated provides solutions for full lifecycle BPM implementations including resources like Project Managers, Architects, Developers, and Process Analysts to ensure a smooth implementation and an effective solution. Below are some of the services we offer:
